Commentary: back of a length and straying into the hips, Danushka gets on top of it and solidly punches to wide mid-on. The fielder chases it hard and nails the stumps at the non-striker's end but Danushka has made the safety of his crease
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length and jags back in sharply, Mendis pushes at it and sends a thick inside edge past the leg stump. Fortunate nick for Mendis
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to BKG Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: on a length and just a shade outside off, Mendis drives it on the up between cover and mid-off. Mahmudullah dives to his left from mid-off to stop the ball
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: speared very full on off stump, Danushka presses forward and squeezes the ball down to mid-off
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: smart running between the wickets from Danushka and Mendis. Back of a length and angling across off, tip and run to the left of short cover and right of the tumbling bowler. A direct hit could have had Danushka, though
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, 1 run

Commentary: hip-high short ball on leg stump, skids on at 136ks, Taskin's pace works against him. Mendis swivels on the back foot and launches a pull over the long leg boundary. This wasn't off the edge. This wasn't off the middle either. Mendis will take it
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to BKG Mendis, SIX runs

Commentary: full and sliding into the pads, helped in the gap at square leg and Danushka scampers back for the second
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, 2 runs

Commentary: chest-hunting short ball on middle stump, Danushka rides the bounce and calmly drops the ball to the leg side for one
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, 1 run

Commentary: rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and punches to the right of Taskin at deep third man
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to BKG Mendis, 2 runs

Commentary: short and angling across off, Mendis runs it down to Taskin at third man again
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length and wide outside off, Danushka stands tall, extends his hands, and smears it up and over extra cover. Excellent hand-eye coordination from the opener
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: short and outside off, Danushka lets the ball slide off the face behind point
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on the hips, Danushka picks it up and swats it in the air but to the right of deep square leg. Mehidy runs across, stretches to his right in vain. Bangladesh can't stop the flow of runs in Colombo
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: Rubel runs in hard, hits the pitch harder, and gets it to zip away outside off as Danushka swishes... and misses
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: another short ball aimed at the rib cage, zips off the pitch, Danushka somehow fends it down
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: Danushka slinks away outside leg, the bowler chases him and cramps 'im up. Stabbed away to cover
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: short and rushes the batsman into a pull, 145ks, pace like fire, miscued to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Gunathilaka, 1 run

Commentary: short on the leg stump, nearly 140ks, the extra pace foils Kusal's timing and shape. This is more a short-arm flap than a short-arm pull as the ball trickles away to square leg. Rubel and Mendis exchange some words The umpires intervene to cool things off
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: Mendis picks it up and launches it over the long-on boundary. Pretty full and sliding into the pads, great wristwork from Mendis. Regal timing
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to BKG Mendis, SIX runs

Commentary: Taskin pulls his length back outside off, Mendis forces a single to deep third man
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: Danushka gives himself room and frees his arms now. On a length and outside off, Danushka drops down to one knee and swings it smoothly over the covers
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, SIX runs

Commentary: back of a length on middle, played back to Taskin. Some respite for the bowler
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: short of a length and skids off the pitch outside the line of off, beats the pull, but hits the thigh pad and rolls away past the keeper
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, 2 leg byes

Commentary: Danushka has thrown Taskin off his lines and lengths. He moves around in the crease, the seamer shoves a short ball down leg
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, 1 wide

Commentary: Taskin attempts a slower cutter but pushes it down the leg side again, the ball rolls away past a diving Mushfiqur. SL surge to fifty in less than four overs. This is SL's fastest fifty in T20Is
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, 5 wides

Commentary: back of a length and outside off, punched up to mid-off to round out a 22-run over
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Gunathilaka, 1 run

Commentary: good length and outside off, right in Danushka's swinging arc. But he loses his shape and only collects fresh air
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: hip-high short ball on middle and leg with fine leg inside the circle. Danushka swivels on the back foot and pulls it past the right of that fielder
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: Mustafiz sneaks through the gate of Danushka with a slower cutter. Full and breaks in outside off, breaks through the defences, Danushka did not spot the change-up. He was too early into the drive and had his stumps rattled. Much-needed respite for Bangladesh
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, OUT
Dismissal_text: MD Gunathilaka  b Mustafizur Rahman 26 (19b 3x4 1x6) SR: 136.84

Commentary: back of a length and skids on outside off, hits the top of the bat and skews to mid-on

Commentary: Mustafiz loses his line again. Darts a shortish ball down leg, it's wide of Mendis' reach

Commentary: back of a length and angling away outside off, glided with the angle to backward point
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: Mendis hits over the top and clears mid-off. Timing: check. Balance: check. Look at that high elbow. This was nowhere near a half-volley, Mendis gets under it and hoists it over mid-off
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to BKG Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on the hips, Rubel somehow escapes punishment as Kusal only flicks it to short fine leg

Commentary: back of a length on middle, Kusal stays leg-side of the ball and punches it to mid-off

Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to MDKJ Perera, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of a length and zinging away outside off, beats Kusal for pace. He aims a leg-side slog but it late onto it. The keeper jumps off the ground to gather the ball
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to MDKJ Perera, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle stump, no respite at all for Bangladesh. Kusal clears his front leg and smites it in the air past the bowler's left

Commentary: back of a length on the leg stump, Kusal quietly bunts it to midwicket

Commentary: pushed through on middle, this non-turner is tapped to long-on off the front foot

Commentary: floated up outside off, Kusal employs the reverse-sweep and finds backward point

Commentary: turning offbreak on off, blocked to cover

Commentary: dragged down outside off, these short balls aren't troubling SL. Pulled off the back foot to long-on for one

Commentary: shorter, wider, scythed to deep point

Commentary: dragged short and attached with width outside off, Kusal forces the ball to sweeper cover

Commentary: really full on middle and leg, Mendis can't get underneath the length but it pats it to wide long-on for two

Commentary: Kusal backs away outside leg and swishes it in front of short cover

Commentary: arm ball, glanced with the angle to short fine leg for a sharp single

Commentary: Mendis rolls out the scoop. Jumps across to this length ball on middle and hits it over short fine leg

Commentary: back of a length and outside off, cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover

Commentary: darted full on the stumps, he hangs back and forces the ball down to long-on

Commentary: Mahmudullah has taken two wickets in four balls. This was another half-tracker on middle, Shanaka swings so hard that he loses his shape and gets more height as opposed to distance. He picks out Sabbir at deep midwicket too. Golden arm indeed

Commentary: slower yorker on middle, backs away and chops through cover-point

Commentary: short and skids on middle, tucks up the batsman for room, pulled to long-on. Seventeen of the over

Commentary: slides on outside off, chopped away fine of short third man
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on leg stump from around the wicket, Liton ventures down the track and hoists it back over Dananjaya's head. Liton is timing the ball handsomely. This chase is on
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: clipped off the pads through square leg. Bangladesh bring up their fifty in 4.1 overs
Commentary_short: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: really full and straight, Liton times the pants off this too. He picks it up and stylishly flicks over midwicket. One-bounce four
Commentary_short: Chameera to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length and veering into the hips, picked up and lifted over backward square leg this time. This goes all the waaaaay
Commentary_short: Chameera to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: slower ball drifting down leg, wide
Commentary_short: Chameera to Liton Das, 1 wide

Commentary: short on middle, Liton gets on top of it and swats it to fine leg
Commentary_short: Chameera to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: hip-high short ball on leg stump, Tamim controls a pull to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: slower full ball on middle, 108ks, Liton backs away and drags it off the toe end over midwicket
Commentary_short: Chameera to Liton Das, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length on the hips, deflected behind square
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: Liton gets inside a short ball on middle and directs it to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: Tamim jumps across off stump, does not connect with a flick, diverted off the thigh pad square through the leg side
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, 1 leg bye

Commentary: back of a length and angling into the hips, Liton is pretty strong off his hips. Picked it up and sends the ball over backward square leg. Liton hits his fifth six
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: Pradeep provides Sri Lanka with the breakthrough! This was full and straight. Liton plays all around his front pad and is pinned in front. Very adjacent. Soft end to a punchy innings
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Liton Das, OUT
Dismissal_text: Liton Das lbw b Pradeep 43 (19b 2x4 5x6) SR: 226.31

Commentary: back of a length and slanting away outside off, 139ks, Sarkar pokes and watches the ball beat the outside edge
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: shorter and outside off, forced off the back foot to point
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: tossed up on middle, down the track and sliced to point again
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: skids on outside off, Tamim simply uses the pace of Danushka and dabs it late to the left of short third man
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower offbreak spins away outside off, Tamim reaches out for the ball with his hands and flashes it away past sweeper cover for back-to-back fours
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: on a length on off stump, forward and jabbed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: picked off the pads to deep square leg for twp
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: short on middle, Sarkar stays leg-side of the ball and runs a single to third man
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length and slanted down the leg side for a wide
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

Commentary: shorter and outside off, miscues a pull down to long-on
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: another miscued pull, this rolls to short midwicket, as Thisara hustles Sarkar with pace and bounce
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of a length and angling across off, steered down to third man
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: Thisara keeps peppering Bangladesh with short balls - he used this strategy to good effect in Bangladesh - Tamim short-arms it away to deep square leg
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: bouncer outside off, Sarkar ramps and misses. Thisara's short-ball attack continues against Bangladesh
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: tossed up and spins away outside off, Tamim runs down the track and launches it over extra cover for a six
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

Commentary: whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: sliding into the pads again, picked off to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: faster and fuller on middle, pushed to the off side
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: clipped off the hips to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: tucked around the corner for one more
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: slower offcutter outside off, runs past the cut
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: straying into the hips, deflected to long leg
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: Thisara has Tamim Iqbal chipping a return catch. He bowls a heavy ball. Back of a length on off stump, tucks up Tamim for room. The batsman is in no position to hook it away. His head falls over and Thisara clings onto the return catch. If Thisara doesn't get you with the bat, he'll get you with the ball. And mind you, Bangladesh don't bat very deep. They have only six batsmen and Mehidy Hasan Miraz
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal c & b NLTC Perera 47 (29b 6x4 1x6) SR: 162.06

Commentary: short and angling into a flick to fine leg
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: bouncer, sails through to the keeper, but too high. Wide
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: Thisara nearly bounces out another batsman. Short and hurries on middle, flaps it in the air but does not carry to short midwicket
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: slower ball on middle, opens the face and steers it to third man
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: quicker legbreak, slides in, punched through midwicket
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: darted very wide and outside off, stabbed into the covers
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: floated full on middle, Mushfiq brings his fast hands into play and reverse-sweeps it over backward point. Great execution from Mushfiqur
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: low-arm slider outside off, carved away to the off-side sweeper
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: full on off, forced down to long-off
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: another low-arm slider angling away outside off, smeared through the covers off the front foot for four
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: digs it short and outside off, good response from Mushfiqur. He rolls his wrists and pulls to deep square
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Sarkar uses his feet, Thisara goes shorter and outside off. Stabbed to cover in the end
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle, slogged away off the inside half to deep square
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: slower bouncer on middle, beats the ramp
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: Mushfiq backs away outside leg. Shanaka spots it and darts it short and wide. Mushfiq reaches out for the ball and is airborne as he scythes it over backward point. Hit flat and hard for a six. What an outrageous shot
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: Mushfiq now jumps across off stump and scoops it to fine leg for four. The man in the deep is squarer
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: Sarkar steps out, the ball dips, and hits the pad
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: pushed through on middle, down the track and dragged to long-on
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: pushed through on leg stump, 94ks, Mushfiq drops down to one knee and nails a slog-sweep over midwicket. Pinged off the middle of the bat
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: back of a length and cramps the batsman for room, pushed back to Danushka
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: off-stump yorker, jammed into the covers
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: pushed through outside off, Sarkar gives himself more room and muscles a drive to the left of sweeper cover for four. Twelve runs off the over
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on middle, Mushfiq ventures outside leg and carves it up and over backward point. Dananjaya runs to his right from third man and cuts it off
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: Mushfiq dances out and scythes a back of a length ball over cover-point. Kusal Perera mops up in the deep
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Sarkar has finally teed off! He backs away outside leg, the bowler follows him. This length ball is swung away over the long-on boundary
Commentary_short: Chameera to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: Sarkar backs away again. Short, slower cutter pushed wide outside off. Past the batsman's reach
Commentary_short: Chameera to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of a length on middle, ramped to third man
Commentary_short: Chameera to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length and angling into a dab through backward square leg. 150 up for Bangladesh
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball floated down the leg side, tickled away to fine leg
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Pradeep returns and bounces out Sarkar. Chest-high short ball on off, Pradeep rolls his fingers over the ball and messes up with Sarkar's pull. He skies it to the short midwicket region, where Pradeep himself settles under this skier
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar c & b Pradeep 24 (22b 2x4 1x6) SR: 109.09

Commentary: low full-toss on off, chipped in front of Pradeep
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: slower short ball outside off, 114ks, Mushfiqur does not have enough pace to work with. He drags a pull to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: slower bouncer on middle, 114ks, turned with soft hands to midwicket
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: shot, Mushfiq. He forays down the track, so the bowler digs it shorter on middle. Mushfiqur jumps off the ground and ramps it up and over the keeper's head
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length and skidding into the hips, diverted away behind square for a double
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: short ball outside off, kicks up, Mahmudullah top-edges a pull that lands wide of deep midwicket
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: Mahmudullah moves around in the crease and Thisara sprays one down leg. Wide
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 1 wide

Commentary: Chandimal and Thisara decide against a review... or they have been timed out. Back of a length on middle, the captain shuffles across off and searches for a scoop. Off the thigh pad and lobs to the keeper. Not bat involved
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: slower ball outside off, 103ks, Mahmudullah waits for the ball to arrive, then drills it away to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: lifter on middle, flies off the surface, flies over the hook. Mahmudullah believes that's too high. Tight call from the umpire
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: Thisara loses his length. Full-toss above the waist outside off, Mahmudullah throws his bat at the ball and clubs it over long-on
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, (no ball) SIX runs

Commentary: the free-hit ball is sent clattering to the square-leg boundary. Back of a length on middle, Mahmudullah sat back, waiting for it, and pulling it away with great authority. Mahmudullah rounds out an 18-run over
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: pushed through on middle, eased down to long-on
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up and breaks away outside off, Mahmudullah stretches out and carves it away to the other Mendis at sweeper cover
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: pushed through outside leg, Mushfiq reverse-sweeps it to Kusal Mendis at sweeper cover. Mushfiqur scampers back for the second
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: fuller and outside off, Mushfiqur stretches out, gets underneath the length and clears deep midwicket with a flat, hard sweep
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: fired on off, jabbed into the covers and they chance a single. Thisara can't effect a direct hit
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Mahmudullah has a dart down the track, swinging a length ball down to long-off
Commentary_short: BMAJ Mendis to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: short, wide outside off, Mushfiq gets on top of the bounce and middles a cut to the left of sweeper cover. The fielder fumbles and concedes a boundary. Kusal Perera lets the ball through his legs
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: Mushfiq steps down the track, reaches out for this short ball outside off and scythes it to deep point
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Kusal Mendis charges in from deep square leg, dives forward, and snags a sharp catch. Slower offcutter, shorter in length, on off, Mahmudullah is way too early into his leg-side swing and holes out
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mahmudullah, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mahmudullah c BKG Mendis b Chameera 20 (11b 1x4 1x6) SR: 181.81

Commentary: Mushfiq is struggling to run between the wickets but a fumble in the deep from Jeevan Mendis makes things easier for him. He steps out, manufactures a full-toss, and forces to deep cover
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: dipping full-toss on middle, punched down the ground to long-on
Commentary_short: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: off-stump yorker, good finish to the over, dug out to midwicket
Commentary_short: Chameera to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: nails an off-stump yorker, jammed down to long-on
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Thisara you beauty! He nails a direct hit from deep-ish mid-off. Poor running between the wickets from Sabbir. He doesn't bother to slide his bat in or dive. He just gave up. This was a top ball to begin with: pinpoint yorker on middle. He jabs it to mid-off, takes on Thisara, and is caught short by a long way. What a game this is turning out to be. Bangladesh's lower order exposed
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Sabbir Rahman, OUT
Dismissal_text: Sabbir Rahman run out (NLTC Perera) 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: really full on middle - near yorker - punched down to long-on. Outstanding bowling from Pradeep
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full-toss, snaking in at the leg stump, socks the thigh pad and rolls to cover
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 leg bye

Commentary: Pradeep aims for another yorker. This comes out as a full-toss on off stump. Mushfiq clears his front leg and launches it hiiiiigh over midwicket. Pinged off the middle of the bat and into the stands. Mushfiq powers Bangladesh past 200
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: Mushfiq hobbles across to the other end. Back of a length on the leg stump, cramps the batsman for room, the ball grazes the thigh pad and rolls to the leg side...or he might have got an inside edge there. Given as a run
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: off-stump yorker, Mushfiqur carves a drive to sweeper cover and hobbles across for the second
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: full and wide outside off, Mushfiq reaches out for the ball with his hands and deliberately slices it up and over backward point. Beats deep third man to his right. He punches gloves with Mehidy. What a boss. Great awareness of the field
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: off-stump yorker, excellent ball on off, jabbed down to long-on. Danushka goes for the ball with just one hand and drops the ball. Sloppy stuff. Pressure can make you do strange things
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: a limping Mushfiqur pulls off a record chase for Bangladesh! He buries the ghost of Bangalore 2016. Look at him celebrating like a madman. Scenes at the Premadasa, He swipes his bat in the air and screams right in the face of Thisara. Mushfiq then brings out the nagin celebration, a la Nazmul Islam. How did he win it for Bangladesh? Low full-toss, angling in at off stump, he coolly flicks it away through the vacant spaces at midwicket. Heartbreak for Thisara and Sri Lanka
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
